Literature.Title: Synthetic molecular evolution of host cell-compatible, antimicrobial peptides effective against drug-resistant, biofilm-forming bacteria.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2020;117:8437-8448
Literature.Author: Starr CG, Ghimire J, Guha S, Hoffmann JP, Wang Y, Sun L, Landreneau BN, Kolansky ZD, Kilanowski-Doroh IM, Sammarco MC, Morici LA, Wimley WC

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:2% Hemolysis=100 µM,Human fibroblasts WI-38:50% Cell death=110 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=1.0µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=2.8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=0.7µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=6.4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=1.9µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=2.8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=4.4µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=3.8µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=4.4µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=1.3µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=2.0µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 19434(MIC=2.3µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 19434(MIC=4.1µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=5.7µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=14.8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=7.0µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=10.9µM)
